CFDIInstallation____________________Install SAT-CFDI from PyPI with:.. code-block:: sh python -m pip install satdigitalinvoiceor install from source with:.. code-block:: sh git clone https://github.com/SAT-CFDI/python-satdigitalinvoice cd python-satdigitalinvoice python -m pip install .
